name: man technologist: medium skin tone

bn:00006156n: Someone who is the first to think of or make something.
Someone who is the first to think of or make something
A 1959 -- 72 United States reconnaissance satellite program
Series of American strategic reconnaissance satellites

The Corona program was a series of American strategic reconnaissance satellites produced and operated by the Central Intelligence Agency Directorate of Science & Technology with substantial assistance from the U.S. Air Force.

bn:00021497n: Encoded computer instructions, usually modifiable (unless stored in some form of unalterable memory such as ROM). Compare hardware.
Licensed copies of Microsoft software identified on the Product List. Software does not include Online Services or Services Deliverables, but Software may be part of an Online Service.
Instructions that make hardware work.
A comprehensive list of the software made by a particular software engineer or organization, usually appearing on a resume, curriculum vitae, or web site.
Something which consists of various components, such as a piece of computer software.
A set of components.
(computer science) written programs or procedures or rules and associated documentation pertaining to the operation of a computer system and that are stored in read/write memory

Modular programming is a software design technique that emphasizes separating the functionality of a program into independent, interchangeable modules, such that each contains everything necessary to execute only one aspect of the desired functionality.
Available code, not necessarily used
Computer software is a general term used to describe a collection of computer programs, procedures and documentation that perform some task on a computer system.

The general term used to describe all of the various programs that may be used on a computer system. It can be divided into four main categories: systems software, development software, user interface software, applications software.
A software system is a system of intercommunicating components based on software forming part of a computer system.

The combination of files, settings, and related general information that is required to install software on managed computers. The general information includes items such as the command line that needs to run on computers to install the software, hardware requirements that must be met before the software can be successfully installed, and a schedule for the installation.

A complete piece of software. A set of instructions for a computer. This term can refer to either the executable form that a computer can execute (executable code) or the human readable form (source code). (Several programs, each of which does a task, can be collected as a software package or suite).
An object that contains the files and instructions for distributing software to a distribution point.

A Configuration Manager object that contains the content files and instructions for distributing programs, software updates, boot images, operating system images, and drivers to Configuration Manager clients.
A software application, or a collection of software applications, designed to perform a specific task.
An executable program file or a dynamic link library (DLL).
A software component for accomplishing a particular thing
Computer software, or simply software is any set of machine-readable instructions that directs a computer's processor to perform specific operations.

bn:00005106n: The Rational temperament is one of the four temperaments defined by David Keirsey.
A person who uses scientific knowledge to solve practical problems
A person who uses scientific knowledge to solve practical problems.

bn:00020358n: Software engineers apply the principles of engineering to the design, development, maintenance, testing, and evaluation of the software and systems that make computers or anything containing software work.
An individual who designs and develops software.
An initiative by a company to promote the development of software for one of its platforms or systems.
A programmer, computer programmer, developer, coder, or software engineer is a person who writes computer software.
A person who creates or modifies computer software.
A software developer; a person or company who creates or modifies computer software.
An individual who writes computer programs.
A person who designs and writes and tests computer programs
Someone who participates in a software development process
One who designs and implements software solutions.

A person who applies the principles of software engineering to the design, development, testing, and evaluation of the software and systems that make computers or anything containing software, such as chips, work (source: Wikipedia).
One who writes computer programs; a software developer.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man technologist emoji showcases a confident individual with a medium skin tone, dressed in modern attire and often depicted with subtle nods to innovation. Apple‚Äôs design language imbues this emoji with a sense of professionalism and forward-thinking, evident in the crisp details and realistic lighting that highlight his focused expression. This emoji is a versatile representation of expertise in tech fields, coding, or problem-solving, commonly used in digital communication to signify intelligence and skill.
